name: Grand Prix Grapplers
description:
Use a controller to swing from object to object to complete the course the fastest. Grand Prix Grapplers is a Mario Kart inspired racing game where players use a grappling mechanic to swing from objects in the scene to complete the race track while competing against their friends.

Pick up items along the way to either help yourself get a leg up on your opponents, or to hinder their movements. Keep an eye out for shortcuts and obstacles around the map. They can either help you, or slow you down!
